name: Format\TableColumnStyle
description: The object for applying styles to columns in a table.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for the table column.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of styles to be applied only to columns that meet specified conditions. This can be used to create a table with alternating column background colors.

properties.name: divider
properties.description: The stroke style for the divider lines between columns.

properties.name: minimumWidth
properties.description: The minimum width of the columns, as an integer in points or using the available units of measure for components. See Specifying Measurements for Components.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The relative column width. This value influences the distribution of column width but does not dictate any exact values. To set an exact minimum width, use minimumWidth instead.
